svg.text: BC Gov AI Hub - Service Scope
What's Included, Conditional, and Out of Scope

g.text: Unique API key, rate limits, OpenAPI routing
Billing tracked to ministry cost center
All via Terraform/AVM - No Manual Setup
Default: shared. Dedicated if data isolation required
Default: shared index. Dedicated if needed
Cost: 10-30+ IPs depending on node count
Default: shared. Dedicated if isolation needed
Must justify IP cost + use AVM module
Platform team only - not for tenants
Any service without AVM Terraform module
Reason: Cannot automate, no IaC support
Reason: BC Gov policy - no exceptions
